metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32436 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
An out-of-bounds read in the function write_title() in subs.c of abcm2psv8.14.11 allows remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) viaunspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-32436` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

abcm2ps - 8.14.13-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: abcm2ps package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.14.13-2').
